alert.note: Alert for Attala (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:09PM CDT until July 13 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 209 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Poplar Creek, or 14 miles northeast of Kosciusko, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Attala County, including the following locations... Mccool and Ethel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
